response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by its previous owners. Given its quality and features, it's worth more than $120 to us. Considering its value, we're offering it to you for $140. This price not only ensures a fair deal but also allows us to cover our costs and make a reasonable profit. We believe this is an excellent opportunity for both of us. Let us know if you're interested in securing this offer.", "product_price": 140}
